title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). There is no indication of any progress or activity happening, such as a busy cursor being shown.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table, it should take a reasonable amount of time and the user should be provided with a visual cue, such as a busy cursor, to indicate that the operation is in progress.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open the table with checkboxes.2. Perform an action that triggers the update of the checked state.3. Observe the long delay and the absence of a busy cursor.
